text: $(l)Descriptors$(), which some know as modifiers, are an optional but powerful component in any spell.
These components can do a very wide array of things, like modifying a spell's strength,
changing what a spell targets, and even reducing the cooldown and cost requirements of a spell!
Every $(l:basics/actions)Action$(/l) in a spell can be paired with any amount of Descriptors.

pages.title: Actions
text: Each Action can be linked to multiple Descriptors.
Click below to learn more about how Actions function.
